assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description: - Groups will share their document using comments only feature for peer feedback. Each group will need to provide positive but helpful critical feedback to the project document of the group assigned by Mrs. Rohr and - - Mrs. Phillips. It is very important to give peer feedback, as sometimes peers will catch something you missed. It will also help you think differently about your own group`s project. (See handout attached for additional copies)
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #10: Check-in: Peer Reviews

assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description:
- Take your first draft document and create the final draft document, using the Google Docs template provided by Mrs. Rohr and Mrs. Phillips; “Final Draft Document (Make a Copy)” 
- You are basically transferring your written information from the first draft document to the final draft document.
- You will need to take each section of the first draft and put it on the correct page of the final draft. (When using the template this transition will be very simple and straightforward).
- You will need to do some important editing. Please make sure each paragraph flows well into the next paragraph in a section. Also, check for opening and closing sentences. 
- Edit your work! This step is very important in developing your final draft document
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #9: Check-in: Creating Final Draft

assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description:
- Complete your first draft of abstract, bibliography, and web pages. 
- You will learn how to write an abstract and bibliography with Mrs. Rohr.

- You will work with Mrs. Phillips on how to create 5 web page samples using Google Slides.
“One web page should be devoted to a model or visual representation of the technology that could be used to create a prototype for display. The model should help others visualize the design and communicate design features.”- ExploraVision brochure
- Your first draft should be completed digitally once the abstract, bibliography, and web pages are complete.
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #8: Check-in: Part IV First Draft: Abstract, Bibliography, and Web Pages

assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description: - Complete first draft of the consequences, and breakthroughs.
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #7: Check-in: Part III First Draft: Consequences, and Breakthroughs

assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description:
- What are three positive and three negative consequences of your future technology? 
- What breakthroughs are necessary to achieve your future technology? (Basically, what parts of your technology need to be improved, for your technology to work?)
- What emerging technologies would be useful?
- What is a test you can carry through to test out one of your breakthroughs? (This is something you create to see if your breakthrough actually works).
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #6: Check-in: Breakthroughs & Consequences

assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description: - Please write up your first draft of your future technology and design process.
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #5: Check-in: Part II First Draft: Future Technology and Design Process

assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description:
1. Each team member needs to design what they think this future technology will look like in the future 20 years from now.  (What is your personal vision of this technology?) (You should have four different design options/visions, or three/four and a combination of all your ideas) You can make a list of ideas, or draw a simple model. (This is meant as a quick draft (10 minutes) to just help convince your group to go with your idea, you don`t need to add color).
2. As a team, decide which of the four design options/visions you would like to use for the project. Or how you would like to combine many of your group`s ideas/features.
3. Make a list of why each of the three alternative ideas were rejected by your team. (This list can go right into your research packet for design process and will be needed later for your first draft).
- In conclusion, what what is your team`s vision for what this technology will be like in 20 years?
- What scientific principles are involved in developing the technology?
- Take time to discuss final technology you have decided to create, and include diagrams and detailed explanations. (You should be focusing more on the writing and rough sketches, as you will have an opportunity for a more detailed sketch when you are working on your final draft and webpages).
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #4: Check-in: Future Technology & Design Process

assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description:
-Your group will be given a document called “First Draft Document (Make a Copy)”. Each group needs just ONE copy of this document. Your whole group will be writing in the same document. To make a copy click “File” and “Make a Copy”. Please save your document as the title of your group`s project. You will be using this documents for all parts of your first draft. (Please remember, we can review all editing history).
-Please write up your first draft of your present technology, and history of technology.
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #3: Check-in: Part I First Draft: Present Technology, and History of Technology

assignments.category: Participation and Arriving Prepared for Class
assignments.description:
-You will be researching your technology. You will spend time in Engineering and Technology on how to conduct research and later on how to write a proper bibliography.
-Please use the research & data collection packet to guide your research. It is very important that your notes are written in your packet, in your own words.
-For now, ONLY research present technology and history of technology of chosen topic. (You will have plenty of time to research other topics later).
-Start collecting your resources now to build your bibliography later. You need to keep track of ALL resources you use for your project. (You will get information to help you in Technology and Engineering in Step #8 for the bibliography)
assignments.name: ExploraVision Step #2: Check-in: Initial Research: Present Technology & History
